name: CLARITY_EPG
description: This table holds information from the Procedure Group (EPG) master file.

columns.name: PROC_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure cluster or group.

columns.name: PROC_GROUP_ID_PROC_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the procedure cluster or group.

columns.name: PROC_GROUP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the procedure cluster or group.
